commit.message:
Provide structured suggestion for binding needing type on E0594

Partially address #45405.

   --> $DIR/borrowck-borrow-mut-base-ptr-in-aliasable-loc.rs:9:5
    |
-LL |     let t1 = t0;
-   |         -- consider changing this binding's type to be: `&mut &mut isize`
-LL |     let p: &isize = &**t0;
